title: AutoEval Done Right: Using Synthetic Data for Model Evaluation
abstract: arXiv:2403.07008v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: The evaluation of machine learning models using human-labeled validation data can be expensive and time-consuming. AI-labeled synthetic data can be used to decrease the number of human annotations required for this purpose in a process called autoevaluation. We suggest efficient and statistically principled algorithms for this purpose that improve sample efficiency while remaining unbiased. These algorithms increase the effective human-labeled sample size by up to 50% on experiments with GPT-4.
context:
Title: AutoEval Done Right: Using Synthetic Data for Model Evaluation
Abstract: arXiv:2403.07008v1 Announce Type: cross  Abstract: The evaluation of machine learning models using human-labeled validation data can be expensive and time-consuming. AI-labeled synthetic data can be used to decrease the number of human annotations required for this purpose in a process called autoevaluation. We suggest efficient and statistically principled algorithms for this purpose that improve sample efficiency while remaining unbiased. These algorithms increase the effective human-labeled sample size by up to 50% on experiments with GPT-4.
translated_title: 自动评价正确: 使用合成数据进行模型评估
translated_abstract: 机器学习模型的评估使用人工标记的验证数据可能既昂贵又耗时。可以使用AI标记的合成数据来减少此类目的人工注释数量，这一过程称为自动评估。我们提出了用于此目的的高效和统计上合理的算法，可以提高样本效率，同时保持不偏。这些算法在与GPT-4进行的实验中将有效的人工标记样本大小增加了高达50%。
tldr: 提出了用合成数据进行模型评估的方法，通过高效和统计上合理的算法，在GPT-4实验中有效的人工标记样本大小增加了50%。
en_tdlr: Introduced a method for model evaluation using synthetic data that increases the effective human-labeled sample size by 50% in experiments with GPT-4, achieved through efficient and statistically principled algorithms.
